__e: Carl, I've never known you date a woman over 40!
A dream about what her life would have been like if Karl hadn't died.
I know. But the whole point is, up until now, Karl and I have not been one of 'em.
Karl's wife said it was something called...
Karl said he's still in love with me.
We just asked Karl about it, and he said, "Well, if Warwick really wants to go, I'll get up and I'll go."
I know who Karl was and who he sometimes still is. But I believe him when he says he wants to change, and isn't that what you're supposed to do when you love someone?
Who knows? It's not fair to me, it's not fair to Karl, it's not fair to you guys... we're all victims here.
